divs: Sighting DetailslOOKED INTO SOUTHWESTERN SKY BELOW STARS DEFINATELY IN ATMOSPHERE WITH NAKED EYE SAW A TWINKLELING LITGHT THAT LOOKED DIFFERENT THAN A STAR. oNLY HAD A PAIR OF BINOCULARS AVAILABLE BUT THROUGH TEM COULD SEE THE SATURN SHAPED SAUCER TURNING SLOWLY CLOCKWISE MOVING AROUND VERY SLOWLY. i COMPARED THE OBJECT TO OTHER STARS AND PLANETS IN THE NIGHT SKY AND LOOKED LIKE NO OTHER. i HAVE ALWAYS BELIEVED IN UFO,S BUT NOW AM FAR MORE EXCITED ABOUT LOOKING FOR THEM.I WATCHE THE OBJECT UNTIL IT SLOLY BECAME SMALLER AND SMALLER HEADING SOUTHWARD AT ABOUT SAME ELEVATION TILL I COULD NO LONGER SEE IT WITH MY BINOCULARS
Summary: CONSTANT COLOR CHANGING SATURN SHAPE DISC
